title: Tom Horton The Invisible Spy
description: Tom Horton is The Invisible Spy in this fantasy adventure set in the 1980s.Tom Horton is a man with a secret. Not being restricted by the constraints of gravity is just one of the secrets he has to keep. His ability is known to only a few, including the British Secret Intelligence Service.Follow his adventure as he travels into adulthood to become one of their most prized assets.Described in Amazon reviews as "an action packed love story"and "A really imaginative and entertaining read"
author: Ian  Davies
